title: Texas A&M Athletics
text:
Aggie Baseball to Host First Pitch Game
Jan 16, 2025 | Baseball
BRYAN-COLLEGE STATION â€“ The Texas A&M baseball team will host its inaugural First Pitch Game Saturday, Feb. 8 at 4 p.m. inside the friendly confines of Olsen Field at Blue Bell Park.
Aggie fans can catch a preview of the 2025 squad a week prior to Opening Day as they will play an intrasquad scrimmage. Throughout the event former members of the Texas A&M program will be recognized and directly following the game, fans are encouraged to stick around for a fireworks show.
Admission and parking for the event are FREE and concessions will be open. Fans are encouraged to park in Lots 100j and 100g.
In addition, Aggie fans can catch softball in action later that evening at Davis Diamond.
Follow the Aggies
Visit for more information on Texas A&M baseball. Fans can keep up to date with the A&M baseball team on Facebook, Instagram and X by following @aggiebaseball.
